title: SharePoint: News in Outlook
description: With the new integration of SharePoint News into Outlook, news authors can preview and send full news posts as emails to their readerâ€™s inbox. To help authors get started, we're also adding 6 templates designed to look great in Outlook and SharePoint. Finally, with our unified page analytics, authors will be able to see their total page reads across outlook and SharePoint as one number.
